heading: DEES |2014 | Editors 3 + UCSD | 15 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Name some things about things on earth that are being used to detect things in space.  [10] In March of this year, BICEP made a stir when they announced evidence for this phenomenon in the B mode polarization of the CMBr. They were wrong-- it was dust.
